Name: Special Handling Code
Notes: Code specifying special transportation handling instructions
Remarks: E0103: Only one of AT5-01 or AT5-03 may be present

Name: Special Services Code
Remarks: E0203: Only one of AT5-02 or AT5-03 may be present

Name: Special Handling Description
Notes: Free-form additional description of special handling instructions to appear on printed bill if special handling code is not adequate
